Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.billing

Class GoogleOnDemandPolicy

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.billing.BaseCustomerVmBillingPolicy
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.billing.GoogleOnDemandPolicy
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVmBillingPolicy
public class GoogleOnDemandPolicy extends BaseCustomerVmBillingPolicy
Implements the default billing policy for the Google IaaS on demand instances.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

      prices - - the prices in a map with entries in the form [[vm-type, OS], price]. Prices are per hour.
